title: Fraction
text: We want to include only values of the input that do not force the denominator to be zero.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: We can set the denominator equal to $$0$$ and solve for $$x$$. What is the value of $$x$$?

title: Real Line
text: Now, we will exclude $$4$$ from the domain.

title: Even Roots
text: When there is an even root in the formula, we exclude any real numbers that result in a negative number in the radicand.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Set the radicand greater than or equal to zero and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Solve the inequation $$x+4 \geq 0$$. Express the solution in the form of interval.

title: Inteval Union
text: The answers are all real numbers where $$x$$ does not equal to $$4$$ and $$x>-2$$. We can use a symbol known as the union, U, to combine the two sets.
